instructions: Open the main Settings app on your phone. Scroll down and tap Cloud and accounts . Tap Accounts . Tap Add account . You will see a list of all the accounts that can be set up on your phone. Active accounts will have a green dot next to them, and inactive accounts have a grey dot. Tap Samsung account . On the Samsung account screen, tap Create account . Tap Next to accept the Terms of Service. Enter the requested information including an email address, password, and your name, then tap Create . To access your account information, go to Settings > Cloud accounts > Accounts and tap your Samsung account .
